title: Covid: Lifting all restrictions in one go is reckless, says Sir Keir Starmer
content:
1. Covid: Lifting all restrictions in one go is reckless, says Sir Keir Starmer  BBC News

  3. Covid Live News and Updates  The New York Times
  4. Is Boris Johnson’s ‘levelling up’ rhetoric fooling anyone?  The Guardian
  5. Attempt to wiggle free from Covid self-isolation ends in warp-speed U-turn as BoJo and Rishi Sunak realise just how bad this looks  RT

localize.title: Covid社：Keir Starmer卿は、すべての規制を一度に解除することは無謀であると述べています。
Covid：Keir Starmer爵士说，一次性取消所有限制是不计后果的。
